scripts.dev: concurrently --names "ML-SERVICE,BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "yellow,blue,green" "npm run dev:ml" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:ml: cd ml-service && cross-env PYTHONPATH=. python -m app.main
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../ml-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
